parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>0.50

</value></part><part><name>gr1 </name>=<value> Lights

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> local

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> local

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Sets if light can be used during the day.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> light [[setLightDayLight]] bool

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> light: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> bool: [[Boolean]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>myLight [[setLightDayLight]] [[true]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[setLightAmbient]], [[setLightColor]], [[lightAttachObject]], [[lightDetachObject]], [[setLightIntensity]], [[setLightAttenuation]], [[setLightUseFlare]], [[setLightFlareSize]], [[setLightFlareMaxDistance]], [[setLightBrightness]]
</value></part></template></root>
